subject: Complete your loan application
body:
Dear H0me 0wner

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Act now on your loan pre-approval.

You can receive $262,000 for 
$677 per month.

Please respond Today.
http://ilook.tw/dd21



Mari Cusack
Your Finance Loan


If you can't describe what you are doing as a process, you don't know what you're doing.	W. Edwards Deming
